name: Floppy Bird (BartInTheField)
description:
So nobody can call himself a game developer without making a Flappy Bird clone. So here is my attempt at making a Flappy Bird clone called "Floppy Bird".  

P.S. you can definitely call yourself a game developer without making a Flappy Bird clone. Although it has been a fun learning experience making one.

Guide Floppy through a pipe infested world by making him fly. Press spacebar or A on a controller to start the game and make him fly.

Flappy Bird is created by http://www.dotgears.com/
